nodes.text: Special Advisor to the Minister of War

The Special Advisor to the Minister of War was a title held within the Sith Empire with the post being in operation by the time of the Cold War. These individuals were tasked on special assignments and used their expertise to aid the Minister of War.

In the Cold War, Khun Tazith held this office and was stationed on Hoth where he conducted a special project to sap the Galactic Republic's military forces on the planet by making them believe that the elite Sith unit known as the Bane Brigade were still alive.
